remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂的顯示格式中的按鈕標題物件。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the caption of the buttons in the object. 資料格式字串由兩個部分組成，在表單中，以冒號分隔的`{A:Bxx}`。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 例如，格式化字串`{0:F2}`將儲存格顯示固定的點包含兩個小數位數字格式。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` formats the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號來表示其為格式字串，而不是常值字串中。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 因為每個資料格中只能有一個值，這個值可以設定只為 0。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|顯示數值的值Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|貨幣格式。Currency format.| |`D`|十進位格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科學記號 （指數） 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定的格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|一般格式。General format.| |`N`|數字格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六進位格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format character is not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的回傳至伺服器時，物件會導致驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時文章回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the posts back to the server. 如果您未指定的值屬性和屬性設定為`true`，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上，不會驗證群組指派時文章回傳至伺服器。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the posts back to the server. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.
